generated_body: In this article, the user may expect a detailed overview of the recent Supreme Court oral arguments concerning the Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA) program. It is likely to highlight the justices' interactions and interruptions during the proceedings, which could provide insights into their differing perspectives on immigration policy and the legal challenges facing DACA. The article may also discuss the implications of the case for both undocumented immigrants and broader immigration law, offering a balanced examination of the legal arguments presented.
